titleStmt.title: The state of a Christian lively set forth by an allegorie of shippe under sayle.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes for the Author; and are to be sold by Sarah Fairbeard, at the North doore of the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: R.Y [i.e. Richard Younge].
Annotation on Thomason copy: the imprint date has been altered to read "1646".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the North doore of the Royal Exchange
